attributes.action: propose to parliament that The Speaker, Mr Martin, be replaced immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He is out of touch with the people.He resisted publication of MP's expenses and continues to be obstructive on this issue.
He lost control in Parliament yesterday. He is past his use-by date and should be pensioned off.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
